body_html: it seems that there was an issue with futex implementation in the linux kernel. First tests seem to indicate that the issue goes way when upgrading the linux kernel from 4.9 (from debian stretch) to 4.12 (from Debian stretch-backports).
body_text: it seems that there was an issue with futex implementation in the linux kernel. First tests seem to indicate that the issue goes way when upgrading the linux kernel from 4.9 (from debian stretch) to 4.12 (from Debian stretch-backports).
body: it seems that there was an issue with futex implementation in the linux kernel. First tests seem to indicate that the issue goes way when upgrading the linux kernel from 4.9 (from debian stretch) to 4.12 (from Debian stretch-backports).
